      • averageRating

        public static void averageRating​(java.sql.Statement stmt,
                                 int movieId)
                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        get the average rating of the movie
        参数:
        stmt - statement to conduct the query
        movieId - id of the movie
        抛出:
        java.sql.SQLException - SQLException

      • averageRatingsAll

                              throws java.sql.SQLException

        抛出:
        java.sql.SQLException - SQLException
